entry.title: 5/4 - 65th Annual Exhibition of the National Society of Painters in Casein & Acrylic
entry.content:
National Society of Painters in Casein & Acrylic
📍 New York , NY, United States
🎨 Painting
📅 05/04/2019 deadline
💰 $20.00 fee
➡ Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

The exhibition features awards totaling over $17,000. The National Society of Painters in Casein and Acrylic was founded to give artists opportunity to exhibit works regardless of style, “school” or subject matter. It is the foremost National Showcase for the two Aquamedia—Casein and Acrylic. Awards and exhibition held at The Salmagundi Club in New York, NY.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Download the prospectus here: https://www.nationalsocietyofpaintersincaseinandacrylic.com
